Gets the score of a player for a specific objective. Returns empty if the score doesn't exist.
fancymenu.placeholders.scoreboard.object: Lists all objectives in the scoreboard, separated by the specified separator.
fancymenu.placeholders.scoreboard.tracke: Lists all players tracked by the scoreboard, separated by the specified separator.
fancymenu.placeholders.scoreboard.displa: Gets the objective displayed in a specific slot (sidebar, list, below_name, etc.).
fancymenu.placeholders.scoreboard.has_sc: Checks if a player has a score for a specific objective. Returns 'true' or 'false'.
fancymenu.placeholders.scoreboard.object: Gets the display name of an objective. Can return as plain text or JSON.
Gets the criteria type of an objective (dummy, trigger, deathCount, etc.).
Gets the render type of an objective (integer or hearts).
fancymenu.placeholders.scoreboard.player: Lists all scores for a specific player. Use %objective% and %score% in the format value.
fancymenu.placeholders.scoreboard.object: Gets the total number of objectives in the scoreboard.
